title: [Unofficial] Gakumas Parameter Calculator
prerequisite: Prerequisite: all lessons are PERFECT, Final exam is first place

points_from_score: Points calculated from Final exam score
what_is_for: Q. What is this page for?
what_is_for_description:
This page calculates automatically required score of Final exam when you input parameters.

And more, auto-select lessons not to make parameters over upper limit(1500 or 1800) because parameters are very important to get high rank(e.g. A+, which is required to watch Episode 10) and parameters exceeding the upper limit are wasted.
bug_report_etc: Please report bugs and requests on GitHub or SNS accounts below
author: Author
zero_score_description: *You only need to pass final exam.
